Hello there! I am **Manoharsha Sappa**, born on **September 26, 2000**. Initiating my educational journey at **Kendriya Vidyalaya** for schooling, I proceeded to intermediate studies at **Sri Chaitanya Junior College**. Having obtained a **B.Tech** degree from **Gudlavalleru Engineering College**, I am currently immersed in the **Master of Science** in **Data Analytics Engineering** program at **George Mason University** in Fairfax, VA, USA, with an anticipated graduation date in May 2026. My academic journey shows that I'm dedicated and determined in the fields of data analytics and engineering.
